name: Cannibal Country
description:
Cannibal Country is a short first person wave shooter, every level is 10 minutes long and as you finish each wave more enemies will spawn. There are 5 Levels to play,  3 different weapons to choose from and 5 different enemies, each enemy has different strengths, as some are more agile while others are much stronger and deal more damage!

GOAL:
The goal for Cannibal Country is to survive until the 10 minutes are up, while trying to survive and reach the highest Wave you can!

CONTROLS:
WASD - Movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
C - Crouch
Q - Melee
E - Pickup Item
F - Flashlight
R - Reload
RIGHT MOUSE - Aim
LEFT MOUSE - Fire
ESC or P - Pause Menu

NOTES:
This is my first game I've made and published, now its not as polished as I'd like it to be, It's a prototype on certain ideas and while it is technically a Short "complete" game, this is just something I've made while learning Unreal Engine.  If having Frame Rate Issues please try LOW Graphical Settings on the Menu also.  so please Enjoy and please Leave any Comments or Constructive Criticism/Feedback! Thank You and Thanks for playing!
